name: Wolf On The Farm 2
description:
O More than 1 000 000 downloads of the first part.
O By popular demand, a cartoon after getting 1000 points.
O Excellent music and sound to play in your headphones!

Wolf and Rabbit are old friends, besides they are excellent actors playing in the popular animated series. And then one day the rabbit got tired of shooting, and decided to take off into the countryside. The thing is that Wolf cannot shoot without the rabbit. Is it all lost? No, the Wolf does not give up so easily. He goes after him, on the same farm to persuade the Rabbit to come back.

Help the Wolf to deal with a lot of work so that he wasn't fired before the time comes. The harvest is coming, and there won't be enough hands as always. Just like before, you need to show craft and skill to catch everything that falls, without losing a single item, except for the bombs of course.

Completely new bright, colorful and detailed graphics. As many as five worlds, with their entourage and a variety of items that you need to catch. Excellent music in each world. And the story of the mysterious disappearance of the rabbit which you have to solve.

The new game is filled with humorous phrases and jokes that rabbit and wolf exchange throughout the game. And in the new Wolf On The Farm! The rear bonuses that will help you in completing the game, as well as bombs and fire balls which you better dodge in time.

And of course, the big surprise! Developers heard the numerous requests of the players of the first part, and fulfilled the dream of your childhood added an actual cartoon, which anyone who scored 1000 points in the game “A” or “B” will be able to watch.


Game features:

• Bright HD graphics;
• New easy-to-use interface;
• 5 various worlds, that change in the course of the game
• Two game modes, easy “A” and more difficult “B”;
• Excellentsoundandmusic;
• The game now has bonuses and anti-bonuses;
• Animation of the fall in now smooth;
• More than 12 items to catch;
• Funny phrases and dialogs;
• First time ever! CARTOON for 1000 points;
